net.tridentsdk.reflect

Class FastClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.tridentsdk.reflect.FastClass

  • public class FastClass
extends Object
    Accessors to the members of a class, does not actually have a ReflectASM equivalent
    Since:
    0.3-alpha-DP
    Author:
    The TridentSDK Team
